sources.title: One Eyed Jacks (1961)
sources.description: Running from the law after a bank robbery in Mexico, Dad Longworth finds an opportunity to take the stolen gold and leave his partner Rio to be captured. Years later, Rio escapes from the prison where he has been since, and hunts down Dad for revenge. Dad is now a respectable sheriff in California, and has been living in fear of Rio's return. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/one-eyed-jacks-1961/

sources.title: One Eyed Jacks (1961) Marlon Brando · Karl Malden
sources.description: The western about a betrayed male friendship is Marlon Brando's only directorial work..

sources.title: One-Eyed Jacks

Years later, Rio escapes from the prison where he has been since, and hunts down Dad for revenge. Dad is now a respectable sheriff in California, and has been living in fear of Rio's return. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

metadata.Plot: Running from the law after a bank robbery in Mexico, Dad Longworth finds an opportunity to take the stolen gold and leave his partner Rio to be captured. Years later, Rio escapes from the prison where he has been since, and hunts down Dad for revenge. Dad is now a respectable sheriff in California and has been living in fear of Rio's return.
